name: Coursebirdie
overview:
Coursebirdie is an innovative and entrepreneurial management learning platform that offers a wide range of business and management courses all suited to the specific needs of students, managers and entrepreneurs over the course of their career.

Its mission is to provide users with a strong and knowledgeable foundation in business and management in order to advance their careers.

This web platform equip students, managers and entrepreneurs with the concepts, frameworks and techniques that are needed to make better management and strategic decisions. In addition, the platform provides its users a unique opportunity to engage in networking activities and enhance their professional profile using dedicated Career Management Services.

The courses are developed by outstanding educators, researchers and institutions who share their knowledge and expertise in areas such as accounting, finance, marketing, business economics, human resources and organizational behaviour, global strategy, corporate strategy, entrepreneurship and operations.

Launched in May 2011, Coursebirdie is headquartered in Edinburgh and was founded by Abhishek Singh. Available all over the world and on number of devices, Coursebirdie has over 2000 current members and a great network around the globe.
